events.name: End of Training Session
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël and Carl discuss their uncertain futures with the team
events.contextExcerpt: Two long whistles signaled the end of the day's training. Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again.

events.name: Maël's Shoe Dilemma
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël contemplates the state of his shoes and his financial situation
events.contextExcerpt: Maël sat on the ground stretching his muscles when he suddenly noticed that the sole of his soccer shoe was starting to come apart again. It’s probably time to retire them.

events.name: Discussion with Carl
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Both express their concerns about their trial periods ending
events.contextExcerpt: Maël, how long is your trial period? Mine is only six months, and it’s about to expire.

events.name: Maël's Extra Practice
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël decides to practice more shots to improve his chances
events.contextExcerpt: Maël stood up, picked up a few soccer balls, and walked to the field with his already separating shoes. The last twenty-one days! If he wanted to stay at Arsenal, he needed to make the most of every moment.

events.name: Meeting with Coach Hans
events.outcome: Hans offers Maël a pair of his own shoes
events.contextExcerpt: Maël stopped, sweating profusely, and turned to see a tall, bald middle-aged man waving at him from a distance. It was Hans, the Head Coach of Arsenal U17.

events.name: Receiving New Shoes
events.timeReference: During the meeting with Coach Hans
events.outcome: Maël receives a pair of Hans' shoes and feels grateful
events.contextExcerpt: Hans quickly handed him a bag with a pair of shoes and laughed heartily. 'Go try them on the field and see if they fit. I have some work to do.'

events.name: Discovery of the System
events.location: Arsenal's Colney Training Ground, U17 Training Field
events.outcome: Maël discovers a system that tracks his skill proficiency
events.contextExcerpt: Suddenly, a few lines of deep black text appeared before his eyes. [Skill: Long Shot Level 1] [Proficiency: (34/100)]
